they say the government has failed to act on increased violence and risks to safety .

there is no justification for this action we have well established contingencies in place to manage prisons and keep the public safe but we are clear that the action today constitutes unlawful industrial action , and we will seek remedy in the courts . ''

documents.title: hs2 : south yorkshire route is most controversial aspect
text: the route that hs2 will take through south yorkshire has proved one of the most contentious of the whole project .
originally the plan was to build a brand new station to serve sheffield and its region next to the m1 at the meadowhall , which caused outrage in the city .
but even more controversial was hs2 ltd 's subsequent proposal to re-route the project further east .
this plunged a new group of communities into uncertainty - most notably the residents of the brand new shimmer housing estate in mexborough .
developers , strata , said they were `` shocked '' by the news and their customers could not believe what they were being told .

documents.title: what you need to know this morning
text: here are the three biggest stories we 're covering this morning - you can click through each of them to find out more and make sure you 're up-to-date :

documents.title: hs2 latest : 'more turmoil ' says mexborough resident
text: a woman who lives on the shimmer estate in mexborough - which could be bulldozed under new plans for the high-speed rail line - .
has spoken of the ongoing uncertainty she and her neighbours are facing .
rachel ridler told me she 's not going to take up the compensation scheme and sell her home , despite the government remaining undecided about where in south yorkshire to locate the hs2 route .

i love my house , i love my neighbours , i love my community and i 'd hate to be the first person to jump ship then find out they 've actually found a way around the estate - so i think we 'll be here another few years yet . ''
author: Kevin Larkin
Doncaster Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: hs2 minister : local residents will know 'next year ' if houses to be knocked down
text: the hs2 minister , andrew jones , has said people in south yorkshire will find out in 2017 whether their homes will be demolished to make way for the high-speed rail line .
he 's been speaking with me on this morning 's breakfast show , following the latest developments on the scheme .
the government 's confirmed the next phase from crewe to manchester and birmingham to leeds , but has yet to decide on the south yorkshire route .
author: Toby Foster
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

text: blaze investigation to be launched

documents.title: hs2 route : meadowhall 'not preferred option ' says transport secretary
text: transport secretary chris grayling said a station at meadowhall was not the government 's preferred option .
he told bbc radio 4 's today programme : `` that option has been consulted on before .
it clearly remains an option we could follow but the view we have taken is that the plans we have set out today are the ones we should follow . ''
the cabinet minister said the government was today `` effectively starting '' the process of allowing households hit by the scheme to claim for compensation .
`` we want to do the right thing by those people but it is not possible to make the kind of investment we need in the future of our transport system without some impact on people , '' he added

documents.title: hs2 route : uncertainty 'horrible ' for estate residents
text: russell holmes , who lives on the shimmer estate in mexborough said residents were still not clear about what is proposed .
he said : `` that uncertainty obviously is horrible for those having to go through it .
`` this estate particularly , people say it 's a relatively new estate , its been here three or four years .
but it 's a really strong community .
people get on really well .
it 's the kind of community where we are proper neighbours .
`` it is a proper community that 's been built , so for that to be destroyed is devastating . ''

documents.title: sport : chesterfield fc owner resigns
text: the owner of chesterfield football club , dave allen , has resigned as chairman and director .
it happened at a meeting of shareholders last night .
the spireites twice won the league two title since he took over in 2012 , as well as the johnstone 's paint trophy .
we 're expecting a statement from the club later today .
author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: hs2 route : 'they 'll have to bulldoze house with me sat on it '
text: karen schofield 's family live on a farm in mexborough and she is worried that it could be demolished because it lies on the planned route of hs2 .
`` i am devastated .
i can not put it into words how heart-wrenching it is .
`` we 've lived on the farm for 40-odd years , my dad bought the land and built it up from scratch .
`` i was born and bred here , my children have been born and bred here and everything we 've built up was for their future .
`` i 'm determined to fight .
if they come they can bulldoze the house with me sat on top of it . ''

documents.title: hs2 analysis : sheffield question still up in the air
text: it 's a couple of years overdue , but the government has finally said where it wants to put the top half of hs2 .
almost .
the biggest hold-up has been what to do with sheffield - and it 's still a bit up in the air .
the original plan was to build a new out-of-town station at the meadowhall shopping centre .
but plenty of people said it was too far away , so hs2 suggested sending trains into the existing , city centre station instead .
that would save £ 1bn - but the new proposal also cuts through the brand new shimmer housing estate in mexborough ( below ) that is n't even finished .
ed miliband is the local mp and he is not best pleased .
the decision is still open to consultation , so they wo n't make a final call until next year .
author: Richard Westcott
Transport correspondent

documents.title: hs2 : ministers confirm northern route - but question mark remains over sheffield
text: the government has confirmed the route for the second phase of the high-speed rail line hs2 from the midlands to yorkshire .
however , the plan does not include the site of a new station in sheffield , after the meadowhall proposal was scrapped .
hs2 has put forward a city centre option , but that would cut through a new housing estate in mexborough , south yorkshire .
opting for a central site would cut costs by £ 1bn and be easier to construct , the company said .
a consultation is continuing and a final decision will not be made until next year .
